sense.def:
To mount a campaign or event
pomeni pripraviti in izvesti kampanjo ali dogodek.

seg.quote: No rescue operations could be mounted.
We mounted an exhibition of recent books.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is mounting
, se veča.

seg.quote: Social problems in modern society are mounting.

sense.def:
To mount something
pomeni iti do vrha;

seg.quote: Walter mounted the steps and pressed the bell.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
mounts a horse
, se povzpne konju na hrbet.

seg.quote: The brothers watched as she mounted the mare.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
mounts an object in a particular place
, ga tam pritrdi.

seg.quote: The sword was mounted in a mahogany case.

sense.def:
Mount
se uporablja tudi kot del imena nekaterih gora.

Kadar človek
mounts a guard over something
, poišče nekoga, ki bi tisto stražil. Kadar pa človek
mounts guard over something
, tisto straži sam.

seg.quote: Strong police guards were mounted at all hospitals.
She had been asked to mount guard over a number of dogs.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
mounts up
, se povečuje.

seg.quote: The soil becomes more and more acidic as pollution mounts up.
